item.title: Stickyickistan
item.description: Modern Stickyickistan Welcome to the enchanting realm of Stickyickistan, a captivating City State nestled on an island off the Sword Coast, where an active volcano stands proudly ...

item.title: Welcome to Quartz
item.description: This is a blank Quartz installation. See the documentation for how to get started.

item.title: Alcohol
item.description: Alcohol has been banned by the Nevercough Tribunal throughout all of Stickyickistan. This law is not often followed, and many citizens believe it should be legalized.

item.title: Mount Zooka
item.description: Looming over Stickyickistan, Mount Zooka is an active Arcanite Coneâ€”a rare type of volcano that sits atop rich Arcanite deposits, constantly pulsing with magical energy ...

item.title: The Seekers of the Vein
item.description: A guild of prospectors and mercenaries specializing in uncovering hidden Arcanite deposits and magical relics. Their operations extend from Mount Zookaâ€™s treacherous rim to the deepest jungle in The Outback.

item.title: Highblades Guild
item.description: This is the guild of swords for hire belonging to the Tribunal Highblade Coalition. The bounty hunting squad Dusk Flame VII belongs to this guild.

item.title: Highblade Tower
item.description: Highblade Tower is the Tribunal Highblade Coalitionâ€™s ancestral home, and seat of power. Located downtown on Nevercough Island. History Highblade Tower is nearly as old as Stickyickistan itself.

item.title: The Ashtray
item.description: A nickname for Upper South Booftown.

item.title: The Molten Note
item.description: The Molten Note is a tavern found downtown on Nevercough Island. A bustling, dimly lit gambling den and music hall, the atmosphere is a mix of smoke, neon glows, and the clinking of enchanted dice.

item.title: Fist
item.description: Texas Hold â€˜em Poker d6 adaptation. Dictionary Fist = Hand SB = Small Blind BB = Big Blind Playing A big and small blind will be identified by using d20 rolls.
